author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Education Department is planning to initiate action against a government school teacher for reportedly pulling a girl student’s hair a few days ago.

According to police, a Tamil teacher of Government Girls Higher Secondary School, Natrampalli, had asked the class X student to bring photocopies of a study material.

“When she returned to school with the photocopies, the teacher had scolded her for taking photocopy of only one page. He pulled her hair in anger, and a small lock of hair came off,” a policeman said.

Police approached

Following this, the girl’s parents had approached the Natrampalli police. The teacher and school headmaster were also called. Police said they decided to approach the Education Department for action.

An official of the Education Department said the District Educational Officer, Tirupattur, was asked to conduct an inquiry and submit a report. “The report has been submitted, and we will soon initiate action on the teacher,” he said.
title: Teacher pulls student’s hair; dept to take action
